name: Tomato Blast (itch)
description:
-Gameplay-

Play as a can of CampBell's Tomato Soup that shoots itself forward towards your mouse. Each time you blast forward you use some of your soup, which needs to be refilled using tomatoes. With this moveset,  your can of soup adventures through 9 levels ending with a final boss (a grilled cheese sandwhich) . PLAY IN FULLSCREEN MODE.

-Paint Jam-

Tomato Blast made made for the Paint Jam 2021 (a game jam where you must create a game in 48 hours with all your art made in ms paint based on a theme).  The follows this jam's theme on "CampBell's Tomato Soup" with the idea of needing to refill your soup and also all of the art assets. 

*The art is intentionally terrible so if you have any feedback please make it about gameplay.
